actionConfiguration.body:
select video_title,channel_display_name,
time_published,
SUM(views) as Total_Video_Views,
SUM(watch_time_hours) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
SUM(estimated_youtube_ad_revenue) as Revenue
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND date <= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
			AND channel_display_name like {{Channel_select.selectedOptionValue ? Channel_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}} 
	AND category like {{Category_select.selectedOptionValue ? Category_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
group by video_title,channel_display_name,time_published
order by time_published DESC
